ai-voice.title:
Just say it, 
We'll handle the rest.
ai-voice.subtitle:
Speak your task out loud. AI instantly turns it 
into a task and adds it to today's schedule.

breakdown.title:
Big goals, 
broken down
breakdown.subtitle: Tell AI what you want to achieve. It breaks the goal into small, clear steps you can actually follow.

notes.title:
Catch ideas 
before they fade
notes.subtitle:
Save your thoughts in Notes, Spin the gacha, 
and AI picks one task for you to do today.
